```{r}
contig_dir = "~/data/10X_bcr_vdj_example/sc5p_v2_hs_B_1k_b/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"

contig = read.csv(contig_dir)

contig
```

```{r}
# Filter out contigs
contig_filtered = contig %>%
  dplyr::select(barcode) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(barcode) %>%
  dplyr::count() %>%
  dplyr::arrange(n) %>%
  dplyr::filter(n != 2)

contig_filtered
```

```{r}
contig %>%
  dplyr::filter(barcode %in% contig_filtered$barcode)
```
